item.title: Rectangle Select
item.description: Rectangle select is awesome. Here’s how you use it. C-x SPC to toggle the start mark. Move your cursor around to select the second point of the rectangle. Now that you have a rectangular area selected, you can perform operations you want. 1 .proc main 2 LDX PPUSTATUS 3 LDX #$3f 4 STX PPUADDR 5 LDX #$00 6 STX PPUADDR 7 8 copy_palettes: 9 LDA palettes,x 10 STA PPUDATA 11 INX 12 CPX #$20 ; 32 colors total 13 BNE copy_palettes Here’s some 6502 code that I copied off a website.

item.title: Hugo Styles Fix
item.description: Browser inspector tools are great as this stackoverflow answer demonstrates. A simple ‘/’ missing in your config and your CSS is messed up. Fixed the bug. CSS applies to the website now. Kinda neat. the commit I could imagine a time when this fix wouldn’t have come. I would have other ‘priorities’ and abandon the whole endevour and delete the repo in a few months after it stales. Hopefully that changes.

item.title: Second post
item.description: Immediate followup. CSS is messed up after deployment. Must have something to do with how I didn’t do something. It still looks pretty though. The time it takes to move from creating a new post with hugo new post/post.md with editing the generated page, adding, commiting and pushing is so low that I should be able to crank out posts fast.
